Currently `rem` is not supported. You can set different font size according to the resolution of page when initializing echarts
Currently you can only display one tooltip in the echarts instance. Please have a try using multiple echarts instances which are connected by http://echarts.baidu.com/api.html#echarts.connect
You can try `legend.formatter` to display any text you want. But the data in legend must be same with `series.name` so they can be connected properly

opp,犯错了，已经解决了，谢谢

> You can try `legend.formatter` to display any text you want. But the data in legend must be same with `series.name` so they can be connected properly

First, thank you for the quick response! Much appreciated :).

Using the formatter still only passes the `series.name` value, there is no way to access the `data[i].name` values. There must also only be 1 legend label per series - of course that makes sense for the default functionality, but then there is no way to have more labels than series. I don't need the legend labels to be connected toggle a series on/off or have any functionality on click. I just need a custom legend that can be whatever array of names I want. As I understand, this is not possible at the moment.

@mmoonzhu 你的这个方法好像不行吧  不会触发series.tooltip

他的意思是:  X 轴和 Y 轴  axisPointer 的 snap 是独立的, echarts 不能从多个点中选出(吸附)一个点.
想要实现: 先以 X 轴吸附到的点为目标, 然后 Y 轴指示线的坐标 y 值等于目标点的 y 值

只能用markline

这个问题有解决吗
@huainanhai 后续没有跟进了，你可以参考一下 mysteryven 的方案

> > MarkPoint 目前版本确实做不到这件事。
> > 如果不使用 MarkPoint，而是使用第一个单独的系列，例如 scatter，那么可以单独在此系列上定制
> > trigger 为 'item' 的 tooltip。
> 
> 那么这个单独scatter系列里设置的tooltip和在option最外层设置的tooltip两者是否是独立的呢？我希望candlestick的tooltip始终固定位置，而scatter的tooltip可以被item的mouseover事件触发并跟随鼠标位置显示
> 补充：经过亲自试验，这两个tooltip是同一个tooltip，但是当是axis触发的时候位置是固定的，当是item触发的时候tooltip位置根据scatter的position配置项而定（这个配置项可以设置为top、bottom、left、right等等）

恐怕 scatter 里面 series.tooltip不会起作用吧

这个问题我刚遇到过。经过测试文档的意思是，如果设置series.data.tooltip生效，必须配置option.tooltip。如果不存在option.tooltip的配置，单独配置series.data.tooltip不会生效。我是这么理解的。

In fact, there is only one file, but I use it directly for my own npm, so I use git + HTTP to integrate it, so filtering the ES files in the package removes the changed files, which are actually compiled things.

I'm afraid it can only be achieved by setting the last label to be something like `'周日        '` so that it will appear to be left than the current position.

If you log the width of the container in `mounted`, you may find that the width of them are not the same:
```js
console.log(this.$refs.chart.clientWidth)
// prints 477, 633, 654, 655 in my case
```

This is because the width of a column is decided by content width of each columns. And it changes when content changes.
In your case, I'd suggest setting `<td>` width using CSS to be fixed, like `40%` or `200px`. Hopefully that will help.

Tested on 4.2.0 an it works. Please try 4.2.0.
Can you provide a demo?

1. Add a custom toolbox feature http://echarts.baidu.com/option.html#toolbox.feature
2. In `onclick`, [get canvas in the form of base64](http://echarts.baidu.com/api.html#echartsInstance.getDataURL)
3. Create a new canvas and use `drawImage` to draw watermark onto the original chart
4. [Export canvas](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10673122/how-to-save-canvas-as-an-image-with-canvas-todataurl)
You should only concat series.data, rather than series.
What do you want to show when appending new data?
In the images downloaded from toolbox, or with `chart.getDataURL()`?
No. It is supposed to focus adjacent nodes, rather than ascentors.
